name: Gerber Top Solder Paste Data File

description: The GTP file acts similar to a .PDF file. It is an exported version of the PCB layout and used to create stencils to apply paste to boards for adding surface-mount devices (SMD), like pads. It is meant to be viewed and referenced but not edited.
NOTE: The Gerber format was originally developed by Gerber Systems but is now maintained by Ucamco.

common_filenames.description: [projectname].gtp - The GTP file is named after the name of your PCB project.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .gtp file in Arobas Music Guitar Pro 7.6
images.caption: GTP file open in Arobas Music Guitar Pro 7.6
